channel.title: Mass-Clicking and Ranged
channel.description:
(Source used: Ultimate PK - its based off cheezescape pk) My server keeps crashing because of mass clickers in ranged. I have observed the source of other combat forms, and found that
PkingDelay = 15;
Stops mass clicking by putting a delay between attacks. Where is the code for ranged? And where would I place that code?

item.title: Mass-Clicking and Ranged
item.dc:creator: @Moptop Moptop
